LanguageData.ZP_NinjaApparel.label: NinjaClothes
LanguageData.ZP_NinjaApparel.description: Clothes used for spying and scouting. Moving quickly, you can raid them.
LanguageData.ZP_MikoApparel.label: MikoCloths
LanguageData.ZP_MikoApparel.description: Shinto is a traditional Japanese animism. This clothes worn by Shinto Miko. YaoyorozuGods that are said to stay in all things will protect them from evil thoughts.
LanguageData.ZP_GujiApparel.label: Kan-nusiClothes
LanguageData.ZP_GujiApparel.description: Shinto is a traditional Japanese animism. This clothes worn by Shinto Kan-nusi. YaoyorozuGods that are said to stay in all things will protect them from evil thoughts.
LanguageData.ZP_SamuraiApparel.label: SamueraiClothes
LanguageData.ZP_SamuraiApparel.description: Clothing worn by the Samurai. Because Samurai spirit resides, you can get protection during the melee battle.
LanguageData.ZP_AsigaruArmor.label: AsigaruArmor
LanguageData.ZP_AsigaruArmor.description: Armor that Ashigaru(soldier) wears. Easy-to-move ingenuity has been given so that any situation can be dealt with.
LanguageData.ZP_ArcherArmor.label: MuneateArmor
LanguageData.ZP_ArcherArmor.description: Protective gear worn by archers. Stable shooting can be done.
LanguageData.ZP_HaoriApparel.label: HaoriCoat
LanguageData.ZP_HaoriApparel.description: A coat suitable for cold winter. Because it can be used as a formal dress, it is useful for important hospitality as well.
LanguageData.ZP_SyogunArmor.label: SyogunArmor
LanguageData.ZP_SyogunArmor.description: Armor for which only the Syogun(general) can be attached. You can be a champion of the battle because it is protected by thick armor.
LanguageData.ZP_JingasaHelmet.label: JingasaHelmet
LanguageData.ZP_JingasaHelmet.description: A Jingasa(helmet) to protect the head of Ashigaru(soldier).
LanguageData.ZP_SyougunHelmet.label: KabutoHelmet
LanguageData.ZP_SyougunHelmet.description: A Kabuto(helmet) that was only allowed to be worn by the Syogun(general). Have a strong spirit as Syogun(general).
LanguageData.ZP_Warazi.label: WaraziShoes
LanguageData.ZP_Warazi.description: Japanese traditional footwear made of straw. It fits the feet and makes the movement comfortable.
